text: The 1901 Wesleyan Methodists football team was an American football team that represented Wesleyan University as an independent during the 1901 college football season. In its third season under head coach Robert P. Wilson, the team compiled a 3–6–1 record and was outscored by a total of 102 to 45. The team played its home games at Andrus Field in Middletown, Connecticut. ==Schedule== ==References== Wesleyan Category:Wesleyan Cardinals football seasons Wesleyan Methodists football
title: 1901 Wesleyan Methodists football team
